amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit market access program funds from being used to promote the sale or export of alcohol or alcoholic beverages, unless such funds benefit a small-business concern.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to restrict the use of any of the bill's funds to promote the sale or export of alcohol or alcoholic beverages unless it is made known to the Federal official having authority to obligate or expend such funds that the promotion activities benefit a small-business concern.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kennedy (MA) amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 133 - 288 (Roll no. 232).
